pr_title: feat: support WINDOWEND in WHERE of pull queries

timeline.message:
feat: support WINDOWEND in WHERE of pull queries

fixes: https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/5666

timeline.author: AlanConfluent

timeline.bodyText: Just for my own knowledge, why don't we fetch from the store using the same bounds as in KsMaterializedWindowTable.java.  Is it because the window sizes are not uniform in size and therefore we don't know exactly where to stop if all we know is the window start range?  If they provide a window end range now, it seems like we could provide bounds to the store lookup (and could use Long.MAX_VALUE anyway).
timeline.author: AlanConfluent

replies.bodyText: The Streams API for session tables is different.  There is no fetch(key, lower, upper) method.
replies.author: big-andy-coates
